title: Book a Corporate Conference
description: A corporate event planner wants to book a two-day conference at the venue.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the main hall and three breakout rooms for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the requested spaces are available.

tasks.description: Generate a quote based on room rental, standard A/V package, and estimated catering costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and sends a detailed quote to the client.

tasks.description: Place a temporary hold on the spaces and send the standard rental contract to the client for signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places a 14-day hold and sends the contract.
